subject: US Delegates NFIU
body:
US Delegates NFIU
NEW YORK CITY
UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
http:/ /www.nfiu.gov.ng/
Attention Beneficiary,
With all due respect,We are from US delegates to the Financial
Intelligence Unit (NFIU) presently in New York U.S.A disbursing long
outstanding over due funds to beneficiaries.please you can view the
Please,we would want to know if you really authorize Mr.Page Liberty
to claim your CONTRACT AWARD INHERITANCE sum $35.700,000.000,00
Million as your next of KIN which has been deposited with the STANDARD
CHARTERED BANK, UNITED STATES OF AMERICA.Please be informed that you
have within 7 working days to claim and receive your funds if you do
not authorized Mr.page liberty to claim and receive your funds on your
behalf and as your next of kin and your representative.
Please,your prompt response is needed before we shall proceed with the
release of the funds through delivery of the ATM CARD,Certified bank
draft,Bank to Bank wire transfer or Cash delivery to his location
because what we have here is bearing your name as an AFFIDAVIT OF
CLAIM has been endorsed on his name and please if you do not
authorized him kindly forward your contact details to the standard
chartered online banking which their contact information is below
here. Your prompt response is needed and have a pleasant day.Please
kindly view the site online here  http:/ /www.nfiu.gov.ng/
Note that you have within 7 days to claim and receive your funds once
you received this message and if do authorized Mr.page liberty to
claim and receive your funds on your behalf then do not reply to this
mail but if you do not authorized him to claim and receive your funds
on your behalf as your presentative and your next of kin then kindly
respond to this mail with your information and contact the authorized
bank for immediately release of your funds with the below information
for confirmation.
HERE ARE THE DOCUMENTS HE PROVIDED.
1. LETTER OF ADMINISTRATION.
2. HIGH COURT INJUNCTION.
3. ORDER TO RELEASE.
BELOW HERE IS THE AUTHORIZED BANK CONTACT INFORMATION.
BANK NAME: STANDARD CHARTERED ONLINE BANKING
CONTACT ADDRESS: FLORIDA USA
CONTACT PERSON:MR.WILLIAM WHITE
CONTACT PERSON;MRS.LINDA JOHNSON
CONTACT PERSON:JOSEPH PHILIP
UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
E-MAIL CONTACT: 
infoscbonline123@aol.com
FILL OUT THE INFORMATION BELOW
YOUR FULL NAME..............
YOUR COMPLETE AND VALID ADDRESS...
NAME OF YOUR CITY .................
NAME OF YOUR STATE ..............
NAME OF YOUR COUNTRY ........
YOUR DIRECT / VALID PHONE NO.....
YOUR OCCUPATION......................
YOUR IDENTIFICATION .................
Regards,
Mr. Gene Wales.
US Delegates NFIU
NEW YORK CITY
UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
http:/ /www.nfiu.gov.ng/

subject: Re:   US Delegates NFIU
body:
Dear Mr. Gene Wales,

I am writing to inform you that I have not authorized anyone to claim my CONTRACT AWARD sum on my behalf. I am the rightful recipient of this award and I would like to proceed with the necessary steps to claim it.

Here are my details:

Full Name: John Doe
Address: 123 Main Street, Apt 4B
City: New York
State: New York
Country: United States of America
Phone Number: +1-555-555-5555
Email Address: johndoe@email.com

Please let me know what the next steps are in order for me to claim and receive my funds.

Best wishes,
Eddie
